results.name: Abington Hotel
results.description: Located less than a mile to the M74 at Junction 13 South of Glasgow. The hotel is accredited 3 stars by Visit Scotland. FREE WI-FI access, spacious and comfortable ensuite rooms with hospitality tray for tea and coffee, remote control televisions, hair dryers, direct dial telephone and free parking.Wake up to a full cooked Scottish breakfast included in our value for money discounted internet rates. A perfect location for leisure breaks such as walking,fishing and golf, for an intimate Scottish Wedding or for a business meeting as the motorway location of the Hotel lends itself to be the ideal half way driving distance from the main cities. Easily found, this friendly family run hotel is within a short drive of Edinburgh, Glasgow, Loch Lomond, Stirling, the Trossachs, Ayrshire and the Scottish Highlands.

results.name: Days Inn by Wyndham Abington M74
results.description: Located directly off junction 13 of the M74, Days Inn Abington has free Wi-Fi, free parking and spacious rooms. It is in the Upper Clyde Valley of the Southern Uplands, within easy reach of Glasgow and Edinburgh. All rooms are en suite and have tea/coffee making facilities, a free newspaper and remote-control TV. Most have views of the beautiful countryside. Reception is open 24 hours a day. The adjacent Welcome Break service area has a self-service restaurant, retail outlet and coffee shop.

results.name: Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel
results.description:
Looking for a place to stay in Oxford? Then look no further than Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Oxford to your doorstep.
Paid wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel offer a flat screen TV.
Guests of Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel are also welcome to enjoy an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
While staying at Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel, visitors can check out Christ Church (1.3 mi) and Magdalen College (1.4 mi), some of Oxford's top attractions.
If you like cafes, Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel is conveniently located near Vaults & Garden Cafe, Rick's Cafe, and Buongiorno E Buonasera.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Iffley Lock (0.4 mi) and Florence Park (1.1 mi), which are some popular Oxford attractions - all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
We're sure you'll enjoy your stay at Travelodge Oxford Abingdon Road Hotel as you experience everything Oxford has to offer.

results.name: Abingdon Manor Inn and Restaurant
results.description: Abingdon Manor provides the only luxury accommodations in the Carolinas or Georgia close to interstate 95. The Inn is listed by AAA as a "Classic Country Inn" and had received the prestigious Four Diamond rating for fifteen consecutive years. The property, on the National Register of Historic Places, was built at the beginning of the 20th century as an opulent private home and, while now an Inn, retains the feel of an opulent private residence. A member of Select Registry, Distinguished Inns of North American, Abingdon Manor is ranked among the best Inns in the country. Located in a residential section of the historic district in the charming village of Latta it is just 25 miles north of Florence. The Inn is halfway between New York City and Palm Beach as well as Washington DC and Jacksonville, Florida and it is just 5 miles east of 95. Purchased by Michael and Patty Griffey from Miami, Florida in 1995 to operate as a luxury Inn, extensive renovations, decorating and landscaping have turned this magnificent building into a refined, elegant setting for travelers. The seven guest rooms in the 10,000 square foot building insures privacy, peace and tranquility. The award winning restaurant, The Dining Room at Abingdon Manor, also rated Four Diamonds by AAA, provides fine dining nightly, with full liquor and wine listing. At a fraction of the cost of comparable properties, the Inn offers the discriminating traveler looking for upscale accommodations a particular value.

results.name: Western Front Hotel
results.description: Located in Southwest Virginia, our hotel puts you close to all the action. Experience the thrill of riding an ATV on the Spearhead Trails, the excitement of kayaking down Clinch River, and the tranquility of hiking the Sugar Hill Loop. After a day of exploring, head back to our rustic hotel to shoot some pool in The Roost, enjoy smores by the fire, or play lawn games with friends. . If you're ready to relax, get cozy in one of our hammocks or cuddle in our comfy beds so you can rest up for another day of action and fun.

results.name: Hillview Guest House Northampton
results.description: The Hillview Guest House is located in the centre of Northampton town, we are a family run B & B offering comfortable accommodation and breakfast at competitive and moderate prices. We are set in the heart of the Northampton town centre and near all the many major business and retail venues, we are perfectly placed opposite the picturesque Abington park to allow our guests take full advantage.

results.name: Creeper's End Lodging
results.description: Creeper's End Lodging consists of two brand new colonial-style cottages nestled at the base of the Creeper Trail in Historic Abingdon, Virginia. These charming cottages consist of two rentals in cottage A and three rentals in cottage B.The grounds consist of a beautiful courtyard which is available for events. Rent the entire property, a cottage or an individual unit.Beautifully designed, Creeper's End spacious cottages incorporate high vaulted ceilings, large picture windows, and loft-style bedrooms and sitting areas. Graceful great rooms, up fitted with gas fireplaces, large screen TVs and DVD players, as well as wireless internet, are perfect for relaxing and reading a good book or watching a movie after a vigorous bike ride on the Creeper Trail. Kitchenettes, outdoor grills, private bedrooms and baths, and supplied linens and towels make your stay comfortable and convenient. All cottage rentals are smoke-free and pet-free (local pet boarding is available). Although family friendly, our cottages are not child proof and cribs are not available.For those who enjoy the outdoors, our elegantly landscaped courtyard is the place to relax, learn to knit, or enjoy a family picnic. And of course, our cottages are just across the street from the Creeper Trail and just next door from the bike shop where guests can rent their bikes and organize their trip down the trail. Browse the quaint yarn shop, also next door, to learn how to knit and buy knitting supplies.

results.name: Hampton Inn Lexington-Historic District
results.description: Welcome to the Hampton Inn Lexington-Historic District hotel in Historic Lexington, Virginia. This unique hotel brings to life 170 years of history. It is located on a seven acre park-like setting within walking distance of the Lexington Historic District and local attractions. As you enter the city of Lexington, Virginia this is your first site of the majestic manor house Col. Alto, built in 1827, just 2.5 miles from Interstate 81 at exit 188B. This Hampton Inn Lexington hotel is listed on the National Register of Historic Places in Virginia. The Col. Alto Mansion is the starting point for your unique Virginia hospitality experience.

results.name: The Crown & Thistle
results.description:
In the heart of Abingdon-on-Thames is the historic coaching inn The Crown and Thistles. Comprising of three individual buildings, clustered around a cobbled courtyard, the buildings boast many of the original features. The restaurant, with its open kitchen, serves an extensive menu throughout the day from breakfast until late inspired by flavours of the Mediterranean. With traditional Sunday roasts and classic home comforts alongside pasta and authentic wood-fired pizza as well as brunch and lighter bites, there's something on offer whenever you stop by.
With 18 hotel rooms, no two are alike with flashed of exposed brickwork, original beams, and rich wallpaper, each sympathetically decorated and comfortable furnished to ensure a relaxing night's sleep.
The Crown and Thistle's dedicated function space, The Barn is a stunning space with timber beams and stone walls and ideal venue for any occasion or event.

While you're in town, practice your swing along the beautiful greens at Holston Hills Country Club and Scenic View Golf Course. Hike along the scenic trails at Mount Rogers National Recreation Area, kayak across the lake waters at Hungry Mother State Park and zoom through the woods by taking a ziplining tour with Hungry Mother Adventures. When it's time to eat, enjoy a delicious meal at a selection of restaurants nearby, many just a short drive away. After a day filled with fun adventures, relax at our family-friendly hotel. Connect to our free Wi-Fi and enjoy watching your favorite shows with our expanded cable package.Stop by our lobby for a complimentary cup of hot coffee or tea. Help yourself to our onsite business center. One well-behaved pet per room is welcome at Red Roof Inn Marion, VA.

The 5 Stylish Bedrooms all with a Modern En-Suite Bathroom are equipped with Solid Wood Furniture, Luxury Towelling, Toiletries and Bedding, Hot Beverage Tray, Flat screen TV, USB charger port and Free Wi-Fi. Our 3 Superior Bedrooms offer more Comfort with Seating and Extra Quietness and Privacy. Excellent Breakfasts are included in all our rates. Guests with special diets can be catered for with prior notice. Enjoy a drink from our bar and a bottle of wine. Free Ample Car Parking available. results.name: Black's Fort Inn Bed & Breakfast
results.description: Black's Fort Inn is truly a very unique Bed & Breakfast. Our property looks as if we are out in the country but we are right in the middle of town situated on nine acres with sculpted hills, lots of trees and rolling hills. We are able to provide our guests with privacy as most of our Bed & Breakfast is designed for that purpose. Our pond is nearly an acre and has a waterfall where the water cascades down over the rocks makes the most soothing, relaxing sound, creating one of the most peaceful settings in the world. The outdoor balcony is very spacious and inviting overlooks our farm, pond and waterfall. The pond also serves as a habitat for several species of wild fowl and if you can relax long enough you can see the Canadian Geese fly in and land on the pond for their rest before leaving the next morning.Our outdoor balcony is very spacious and inviting. It overlooks our farm, pond and the lovely waterfall. We have a second porch that is equally spacious including a grape arbor that winds up at a cozy covered porch with the perfect view of our waterfall. Our guests tell us how peaceful and beautiful our property is.I love to cook for all of our guests and one of my most famous & favorite breakfast dishes requested is our "Cat Head" Biscuits & Gravy.Such wonderful memories are made here, and we make so many nice friends. All of the priceless memories we have of each of our guests make us so happy that we can share our beautiful place with our wonderful guests.

results.name: A Tailor's Lodging
results.description:
Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Abingdon, A Tailor's Lodging is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its romantic environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, A Tailor's Lodging makes it easy to enjoy the best of Abingdon.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the bed and breakfast.
If you are driving to A Tailor's Lodging, free parking is available.
Nearby landmarks such as St Thomas Episcopal Church (0.0 mi) and Sinking Spring Cemetery (0.5 mi) make A Tailor's Lodging a great place to stay when visiting Abingdon.
If you like Mexican restaurants, A Tailor's Lodging is conveniently located near Los Arcos, El bigotes Mexican grill, and Taco Bell.
If you're looking for things to do, you can check out The Art Depot (0.5 mi), Historical Society of Washington County, VA (0.5 mi), or William King Museum of Art (0.9 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
A Tailor's Lodging is sure to make your visit to Abingdon one worth remembering.

results.name: Alpine Motel
results.description:
Alpine Motel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Abingdon, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as St Thomas Episcopal Church (1.7 mi) and The Art Depot (2.2 mi), guests of Alpine Hotel can easily experience some of Abingdon's most well known attractions.
You'll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a refrigerator, and you can stay connected during your stay as Alpine Motel offers guests free wifi.
The motel features a 24 hour front desk. Plus, Alpine Hotel offers free breakfast, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
Abingdon has plenty of spots serving up great crab dishes. So when you're here, be sure to check out popular spots like The Tavern, Harbor House Seafood Restaurant, and 128 Pecan.
There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular art museums such as William King Museum of Art.

results.name: The Inn at Locke House
results.description: The Inn at Locke House is an award-winning restored historic farmhouse and offers the charm and nostalgia of Gold Rush-era California with the amenities of the 21st century. Situated on the highest point in the village of Lockeford, the brick house was built from 1862-1882 by the founder of the town, and is national historic landmark. The Inn at Locke House sits on a bluff overlooking serene and picturesque walnut orchards. On clear winter days, the snow-capped Sierra Nevada range majestically beckons you eastward for wintertime fun. Beautiful gardens and a park-like landscape will be sure to relax your soul. Two blocks away is renowned Lockeford Meats, where patrons often wait over 2 hours to take home selections from over a dozen varieties of sausage. The Inn at Locke House is centrally located the Lodi Wine Appellation, which boasts over 75 wineries, many of which are known for old-growth Zinfandel grapevines. The inn is a 25-minute drive from downtown Stockton and under 2 hours away from the Bay Area. Guest rooms feature romantic, natural gas-powered "wood-burning" stoves to keep you cozy in the winter and whisper-quiet, modern air conditioning units to keep you cool in the summer. Free high-speed WiFi is available throughout the inn. Each homey guest room at this historic brick farmhouse is uniquely decorated and features Civil War-era antique furnishings. French toast, locally-sourced farm-fresh eggs, and fresh fruit are just some of the breakfast options at The Inn at Locke House. Boxed breakfasts are also available to go. Complimentary snacks and soft drinks and purified drinking water are available all day for guests. Summertime activities, such as kayaking, biking, hiking and boating are all within 20 minutes of the inn. Free Lodi Wine Trail maps and guidebooks are also available at the inn. Visit the Lodi Wine and Visitors Center for more information.

results.name: Abbington Green Bed & Breakfast Inn and Spa
results.description: History. Style. Romance. Abbington Green is located in the lovely Montford Historic District less than a mile from downtown Asheville. We are a AAA 4-Diamond Inn and Select Registry property with prize-winning English gardens. All suites have king-size beds, a fireplace, individual room climate controls: air conditioning and heat, luxury baths with whirlpools and showers, towel warmers, HD TV + cable, coffee makers and mini refrigerators. Free high-speed mesh Wi-Fi throughout the inn. Pet-friendly suites available in the carriage house (dogs only). We offer free off-street parking and an electric car charging station. Walk to dinner and downtown in just 25 minutes. Take a leisurely stroll to the Botanical Gardens at Asheville, run, or walk your dog along the Reed Creek Greenway, just a 3-minute walk from the inn. Enjoy one of three eating establishments in our own Montford neighborhood. Rates include a nightly social hour with local beers, ciders, red and white wine and snacks.
results.hotel_classified_by: This property is classified according to Giata.

results.name: Three Tuns
results.description:
Three Tuns is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Great Abington, offering a charming environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Rooms at Three Tuns provide a flat screen TV, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
You can also enjoy a lounge while staying at Three Tuns. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Three Tuns.
While you're here, be sure to check out Little Chef (1.1 mi), a popular restaurant that is within walking distance of Three Tuns.
Enjoy your stay in Great Abington!
results.address: 75 High Street, Great Abington CB21 6AB England

results.name: Kona Kai Resort
results.description: Kona Kai is a magical hideaway, teeming with the natural beauty of old Key Largo and hand-polished into one of the most exclusive resorts known to the Florida Keys. Our resort is private, very intimate, and adult-only (14 or older). The fourteen (14) charming guest rooms and suites are as refreshing, unique, and fanciful as their tropical fruit namesakes. Washed with natural light, 100% cotton fabrics, and original art, the overall feeling is one of elegant simplicity and perfection. You instantly feel at home, carefree and comfortable.
results.address: 97802 Overseas Highway Mm 98, Key Largo, FL 33037-2229

results.name: Kingfisher Barn Holiday Cottages
results.hotel_classified_by: This property is classified according to Giata.

results.name: Barn Owl Accommodation
results.description: B & B or Self Catering - 2 Self Contained character properties with vaulted ceilings and exposed beams, in the grounds of the owners home. Linton is a conservation village 10 miles south of Cambridge City centre. Walking distance of Chilford Hall and few minutes drive to Newmarket. Both Suitable for Couples and family rooms.Vintage cast iron double bed & Sofa bed in Barn Owl or King Size bed in Owls Loft additional beds and cot bed available on request.Dogs welcome. Walkers and cyclists welcome.Drying and storage facilities available.Several good places to eat at Country Pub's, Bistro and Restaurants within walking and short travelling distance.

results.name: Shavers of Abingdon B & B
results.description: Bed and Breakfast, offering full hot cooked breakfasts with homemade breads and pastries, local eggs and sausage, and seasonal local fruits and vegetables. Check-in snack available by request, soft drinks and bottled water available at all times.

results.name: Holmlands Bed and Breakfast
results.description: Helen and John would like to welcome you to their family run Bed and Breakfast.Located just off the M74 in South Lanarkshire. We are situated in a quiet rural location convenient for visiting Scottish Borders, Lanark, Biggar and Moffat. Glasgow and Edinburgh are within an hours drive. Built in 1903, this interesting Edwardian property sits in an acre of land with our own vegetable plot and free ranging hens and ducks providing a rich supply of our own produce.surrounded by rolling hills of the Clyde Valley. It is such a great place for a short break any time of year. Holmlands is an ideal location for an overnight stay to or from the Highlands and Islands. With direct access to the M74/M8 and the A702 Biggar to Edinburgh road.
results.address: 22 Carlisle Road Crawford, Biggar ML12 6TW Scotland
results.hotel_classified_by: This property is classified according to Giata.

results.name: Millsap-Baker Estate
results.description: At The Millsap-Baker Estate, you don't just get a room and breakfast - you get personal attention and service that is truly "a cut above the rest." Built by our great great uncle in 1895, this historic Queen Anne Victorian manor house and four of its original bedrooms have been completely restored and authentically furnished to Victorian grandeur - an elegant retreat in the Blue Ridge Mountains.

results.name: Riverside Campground
results.address: 18496 N Fork River Rd, Abingdon, VA 24210-4336

results.name: River Trail Cabins
results.description: Experience mountain living at its finest. Pine log construction throughout with ceilings of pine lumber. These Grand-Room cabins provide everything you'll need to relax after that day of activities in the mountains. All cabins come with a fully furnished kitchen, dining area, enclosed bathroom with shower, Bedroom area, living room area with 32" satellite TV, gas logs, Jacuzzi tub for two and a back porch over-looking Laurel Creek and The Virginia Creeper Trail.

results.name: Northwood Inn
results.description: Magnificently restored Victorian has 19th century charm and 21st??? century comforts including all private baths (two with Jacuzzis for two),??? central air-conditioning, complimentary beach tags, bicycles and roof top whirlpool spa. The Inn is conveniently located 3 blocks from the beach, boardwalk, shops and restaurants. 30 miles north of Cape May and 8 miles south of Atlantic City. Bountiful breakfasts, cool porches and Carolina rockers.

results.name: Inverdoorn Game Reserve
results.address: Cape Winelands, Ceres, Witzenberg Municipality 6835 South Africa

results.name: Mountain Laurel Inn
results.description: A cozy, familiar elegance. The Mountain Laurel Inn in Damascus, VA is the perfect balance of elegant and cozy. With this Victorian B&B, set on more than 3 acres of lush green grounds, nestled in trees and mountain tops; you'll have the best of both worlds. Only minutes from downtown Damascus, it's a quiet spot to get away from it all. Sit on one of two porches, front and back facing. Take a swim or just relax by the pool after a day of hiking or biking on the Creeper Trail or the Appalachian Trail. Take a break from a day of touring the local art galleries, shopping and of course, the historic Barter Theatre. Although the Mountain Laurel Inn was built in the early 1900's (with beautiful American Chestnut and Golden Oak paneling throughout), you will be comfortable no matter the weather with central heating, central A/C, free WiFi, a TV in every room with Roku and off-street parking.
results.address: 22750 Jeb Stuart Highway, US Rte. 58 PO Box 1015, Damascus, VA 24236-1015
